item.title: Git Related Videos
item.description: I’ve started to create some Git related videos in my YouTube profile, this post will collect all of them for easier access. Git Internals First Command: Hash Object YouTube video GitHub Perform Security Code Analysis in GitHub with CodeQL and GitHub actions How to setup a GitHub Action Workflow to run CodeQL analysis on your code Gian Maria.
